ðŸ“– Summary: Wormholy is an iOS network debugging tool that allows developers to inspect network traffic without writing extra code. It captures all NSURLSession traffic, reveals request and response details, and offers features like host blacklisting, Postman collection export, and request statistics. It is designed to simplify and accelerate the process of finding and fixing network-related bugs in iOS applications.
